6.80: Increased  Mystic Flare total damage from 600/900/1200 to 600/1000/1400.
6.81: Increased base movement speed from 315 to 325. Increased  Concussive Shot damage from 50/100/150/200 to 60/120/180/240.
6.82: Concussive Shot Is now disjointable. Reduced movement speed slow from 40% on each level to 30%/35%/40%/45%. Increased  Mystic Flare duration from 2 to 2.2 (total damage stays same).
6.79: Increased  intelligence gain from 3.2 to 3.6. Added  Aghanim's Scepter upgrade for Skywrath Mage: Reduces  Mystic Flare cooldown from 60/40/20 to 20/10/0.
6.81b: Increased  Ancient Seal magic resistance reduction from 18%/24%/30%/36% to 30%/35%/40%/45%.
6.74: Increased base  intelligence from 24 to 27.  Arcane Bolt Increased bonus damage per intelligence from 1.5 to 1.6. Reduced manacost from 90 to 70. Reduced  Concussive Shot cooldown from 20 on each level to 20/19/18/17.
6.75: Added to Captain's Mode. Reduced  Concussive Shot cooldown from 20/19/18/17 to 20/18/16/14.
6.82c: Increased  Ancient Seal cooldown from 11 to 14. Increased  Mystic Flare duration from 2.2 to 2.4 (total damage stays same).
6.73b: Fixed Skywrath Mage not triggering  Land Mines.
